Package ZuulBad

Class Game

java.lang.Object
javafx.scene.Node
javafx.scene.Parent
javafx.scene.layout.Region
javafx.scene.layout.Pane
javafx.scene.layout.VBox
ZuulBad.Game
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.css.Styleable, javafx.event.EventTarget
public class Game
extends javafx.scene.layout.VBox
This class is the controller class for the graphical user interface and it connects the other classes of the game. In this class the main interactions are realized.
Author:
Daniel Birk, Katerina Matysova, Sarah Engelmayer

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private void checkVitals()
    Check if the player is still alive (time, hunger and life points).
    private void chooseEasy​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Show the welcome display when the player chose the difficulty 'EASY'.
    private void chooseHeavy​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Show the welcome display when the player chose the difficulty 'HEAVY'.
    private void chooseMedium​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Show the welcome display when the player chose the difficulty 'MEDIUM'.
    void destroy​(java.lang.String typedWord)
    Destroy an item from the backpack.
    void drop​(java.lang.String typedWord)
    Drop an item from the backpack into the current room.
    void eatFromBackpack​(java.lang.String foodstring)
    Eat a food which is stored in the backpack.
    void eatFromRoom​(java.lang.String foodstring)
    Eat a food item lying in the current room.
    static Level getLevel()
    Getter for the level of difficulty.
    private Room getRandomRoom()
    Chooses an arbitrary room of the game except the teleporter-room.
    private void goRoom​(java.lang.String direction)
    Try to move into one direction.
    private void handleChangeToWinnerDisplay​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Show the winner display and rotate an image of a crown.
    private void handleClickDestroy​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    By click on the backpack's button 'destroy' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is an item with that name it is removed from backpack.
    private void handleClickDrop​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    By click on the backpack's button 'drop' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is an item with that name it is dropped and removed from backpack.
    private void handleClickEat​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    By click on the backpack's button 'eat' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is a food item with that name it is eaten and removed from backpack.
    private void handleClickHelp​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Show a popup with hints by click on 'help'.
    private void handleClickHint​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Display the hint from a NPC.
    private void handleClose​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Exit the game.
    private void handleEatFoodClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Let the food disappear from the room after eating it.
    private void handleFoodPopup()
    Let the food show up in the room.
    private void handleGoDownByClickOnStairsDown()
    Change to the next room into the direction 'down'.
    private void handleGoEastByClickOnRectangle()
    Change to the next room in the east.
    private void handleGoNorthByClickOnRectangle()
    Change to the next room in the north.
    private void handleGoSouthByClickOnRectangle()
    Change to the next room in the south.
    private void handleGoUpByClickOnStairsUp()
    Change to the next room into the direction 'up'.
    private void handleGoWestByClickOnRectangle()
    Change to the next room in the West.
    private void handlePopupClose()
    Sets the popup panes to invisible.
    private void handleQuit​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Show the looser-display when the player clicks on 'quit'.
    private void handleReadInstructions​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    sets only the pane for the instructions visible.
    private void handleRestart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Show the difficulty selection display when the player wants to restart the game.
    private void handleRoomPopup()
    Show the description of the current room in the popup.
    private void handleStart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    sets only the maingameDisplay visible.
    private void handleStaticItemPopup()
    Let the static items shop up in the room.
    private void handleStoreFoodClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Display the food in the backpack after taking it from the room. * @param ActionEvent click on 'store' button in the room next to the foodImage
    private void handleStoreValuableClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Display the valuable in the backpack after taking it from the room.
    private void handleStoreWeaponClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
    Display the weapon in the backpack after taking it from the room. * @param ActionEvent click on 'store' button in the room next to the weaponImage
    private void handleValuablePopup()
    Let the valuables show up in the room.
    private void handleWeaponPopup()
    Let the weapons show up in the room.
    private java.lang.String hint()
    Return the NPC hint if there is one and the player has the suitable valuable in the backpack.
    private void KillMonsterPopup()
    Show that the player killed the monster in a popup.
    private void looseGame()
    Show the display for loosing the game
    private void monsterDamagePopup()
    Show that the monster caused damage to the player in a popup.
    private void openDescriptionPopup()
    Show the description popup and set the other popups to invisible.
    void play()
    Starts playing the game.
    private void refreshBackpack()
    Refresh the backpack so that items disappear when they are dropped/consumed or appear when they are taken.
    private void rescuePrincess()
    Rescue the princess and win the game if the player has the valuable 'dragonglass' in his/her backpack.
    private void roomLockedPopup()
    Show that the room is locked in a popup.
    private void roomUnlockedPopup()
    Show that the room is unlocked in a popup.
    private void rotateImage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView image)
    rotates an ImageView to 360 degrees and back for several times.
    private void setExitLabels()
    Show the rectangles (doors) to next rooms if there are according exits.
    private void setItemLabels()
    set the labels of the items in a room.
    private void setOtherLabels()
    Display the label of the backpack.
    void setRoomOnMapVisible()
    Display the GridPane for basement, ground or second floor depending on the room the player is in.
    private void setUpRoom()
    Sets up the room.
    private void store​(java.lang.String itemToStore)
    Put a portable item lying in the current room into the inventory.
    private void switchRoom​(Room nextRoom)
    Switch the room and update the statics: decrease time, increase hunger, increase life points
    private boolean timeOver​(int time)
    Defines that the game is over if the variable 'time' is less than one.
    javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty timeProperty()
    Getter for time-Property.
    private void tryKillMonster​(Room nextRoom)
    Kill the monster in the room if the player has a weapon in the backpack.
    private void tryUnlockRoom​(Room nextRoom)
    Unlock a locked room if the player has a key in his backpack.
    private void waitAndEnd()
    plays the PauseTransition-variable.
    private void winGame()
    Show the display before the winner-Display.

  • Field Details

    • currentRoom

      private Room currentRoom
      The room in which the player is at the moment.

    • environment

      private Environment environment
      An instance of the class Environment to use its methods.

    • player

      private Player player
      An instance of the class Player to interact with its methods.

    • random

      private java.util.Random random
      A instance of the variable Random. To make teleporting to a random room possible.

    • difficultyLevel

      private static Level difficultyLevel
      The Level of difficulty of the game. By default it is set to level EASY. It influences the maximum duration of the game (how often a the player can switch room), the amount of damage monsters cause on the players health when attacking and how much weight the player's backpack can hold.

    • time

      private int time
      Time for the player to complete the game. Measured by the number of room changes of the player.

    • timeProperty

      private javafx.beans.property.SimpleIntegerProperty timeProperty
      Time for the player to complete the game. Gets the value of 'time'. Necessary for the according Change-Listener.

    • visiblePause

      private javafx.animation.PauseTransition visiblePause
      a PauseTransition for displaying the informations in popups for a definite time.

    • Game

      public Game()
      initializes the variables environment, timeProperty, player and visiblePause.

    • handlePopupClose

      private void handlePopupClose()
      Sets the popup panes to invisible.

      private void handleRoomPopup()
      Show the description of the current room in the popup.

      private void handleFoodPopup()
      Let the food show up in the room.

    • handleWeaponPopup

      private void handleWeaponPopup()
      Let the weapons show up in the room.

    • handleValuablePopup

      private void handleValuablePopup()
      Let the valuables show up in the room.

    • handleStaticItemPopup

      private void handleStaticItemPopup()
      Let the static items shop up in the room.

    • openDescriptionPopup

      private void openDescriptionPopup()
      Show the description popup and set the other popups to invisible.

    • waitAndEnd

      private void waitAndEnd()
      plays the PauseTransition-variable. When the time ends the popup is closed.

    • KillMonsterPopup

      private void KillMonsterPopup()
      Show that the player killed the monster in a popup. Show the popup for a definite time which is determined in the variable 'visiblePause'.

    • monsterDamagePopup

      private void monsterDamagePopup()
      Show that the monster caused damage to the player in a popup. Show the popup for a definite time which is determined in the variable 'visiblePause'.

    • roomLockedPopup

      private void roomLockedPopup()
      Show that the room is locked in a popup. Show the popup for a definite time which is determined in the variable 'visiblePause'.

    • roomUnlockedPopup

      private void roomUnlockedPopup()
      Show that the room is unlocked in a popup. Show the popup for a definite time which is determined in the variable 'visiblePause'.

    • handleStart

      private void handleStart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      sets only the maingameDisplay visible.

      sets only the pane for the instructions visible.

      Exit the game. Used when the player clicks the close-button.

    • handleRestart

      private void handleRestart​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      Show the difficulty selection display when the player wants to restart the game.

    • handleGoNorthByClickOnRectangle

      private void handleGoNorthByClickOnRectangle()
      Change to the next room in the north. This is called clicking on the northDoorRectangle.

    • handleGoSouthByClickOnRectangle

      private void handleGoSouthByClickOnRectangle()
      Change to the next room in the south. This is called clicking on the southDoorRectangle.

    • handleGoEastByClickOnRectangle

      private void handleGoEastByClickOnRectangle()
      Change to the next room in the east. This is called clicking on the EastDoorRectangle.

    • handleGoWestByClickOnRectangle

      private void handleGoWestByClickOnRectangle()
      Change to the next room in the West. This is called clicking on the westDoorRectangle.

    • handleGoUpByClickOnStairsUp

      private void handleGoUpByClickOnStairsUp()
      Change to the next room into the direction 'up'. This is called clicking on upDoorRectangle.

    • handleGoDownByClickOnStairsDown

      private void handleGoDownByClickOnStairsDown()
      Change to the next room into the direction 'down'. This is called clicking on downDoorRectangle.

    • refreshBackpack

      private void refreshBackpack()
      Refresh the backpack so that items disappear when they are dropped/consumed or appear when they are taken.

    • handleClickEat

      private void handleClickEat​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      By click on the backpack's button 'eat' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is a food item with that name it is eaten and removed from backpack. Refresh the content of the backpack displayed in the label after eating.
      Parameters:
      ActionEvent - click on the button 'eat'

    • handleClickDrop

      private void handleClickDrop​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      By click on the backpack's button 'drop' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is an item with that name it is dropped and removed from backpack. Refresh the content of the backpack displayed in the label after dropping.
      Parameters:
      ActionEvent - click on the button 'drop'

    • handleClickDestroy

      private void handleClickDestroy​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      By click on the backpack's button 'destroy' the string in the textfield is analysed and if there is an item with that name it is removed from backpack. Refresh the content of the backpack displayed in the label after destroying.
      Parameters:
      ActionEvent - click on the button 'destroy'

    • handleClickHint

      private void handleClickHint​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      Display the hint from a NPC.

    • handleEatFoodClick

      private void handleEatFoodClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      Let the food disappear from the room after eating it. Check first if the current room contains a food item.
      Parameters:
      ActionEvent - click on 'eat' button in the room

    • handleStoreFoodClick

      private void handleStoreFoodClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      Display the food in the backpack after taking it from the room. * @param ActionEvent click on 'store' button in the room next to the foodImage

    • handleStoreWeaponClick

      private void handleStoreWeaponClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      Display the weapon in the backpack after taking it from the room. * @param ActionEvent click on 'store' button in the room next to the weaponImage

    • handleStoreValuableClick

      private void handleStoreValuableClick​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      Display the valuable in the backpack after taking it from the room.
      Parameters:
      ActionEvent - click on 'store' button in the room next to the valuable item image

    • play

      public void play()
      Starts playing the game. Creating items and distribute them to the rooms, creates an instance of Player, sets the time depending on the difficulty Level, sets the first room, sets up the first room and sets up the Change-Listeners for the variables lifeBar and foodBar (for class Player), time (for Game) and maxWeight (for inventory).

    • timeProperty

      public javafx.beans.property.IntegerProperty timeProperty()
      Getter for time-Property. Necessary for the listener to control the variable 'time'.
      Returns:
      the timeProperty variable

    • setItemLabels

      private void setItemLabels()
      set the labels of the items in a room. If there are items set its labels to visible and display its name. Otherwise set the itemImage, related buttons and label to invisible.

    • setExitLabels

      private void setExitLabels()
      Show the rectangles (doors) to next rooms if there are according exits.

    • setOtherLabels

      private void setOtherLabels()
      Display the label of the backpack. Display its current weight and maximum portable weight.

    • checkVitals

      private void checkVitals()
      Check if the player is still alive (time, hunger and life points). If not, set an according message into the reasonForLoosingLabel.

    • setUpRoom

      private void setUpRoom()
      Sets up the room. Displays the items, the non player character, the images and labels of the current room and clear the Text-Area which displays general information. Increments the number of entries of the current room.

    • looseGame

      private void looseGame()
      Show the display for loosing the game

    • winGame

      private void winGame()
      Show the display before the winner-Display. Called when the game's goal is reached. It tells the story that the princess is rescued from a monster now.

    • handleChangeToWinnerDisplay

      private void handleChangeToWinnerDisplay​(javafx.event.ActionEvent ActionEvent)
      Show the winner display and rotate an image of a crown. This is the last display of the game when winning.

    • rotateImage

      private void rotateImage​(javafx.scene.image.ImageView image)
      rotates an ImageView to 360 degrees and back for several times.
      Parameters:
      image - ; the image that should be rotated

    • goRoom

      private void goRoom​(java.lang.String direction)
      Try to move into one direction. If there is an exit, enter the new room. If the next room is locked, try to unlock it. If the next room is the teleporter room, get teleported. If there is a monster in the next room, try to beat it. If the room is the final room, try to rescue the princess. Otherwise print an error message in the information text field. Afterwards check if player is still alive.

    • switchRoom

      private void switchRoom​(Room nextRoom)
      Switch the room and update the statics: decrease time, increase hunger, increase life points

    • tryUnlockRoom

      private void tryUnlockRoom​(Room nextRoom)
      Unlock a locked room if the player has a key in his backpack. Remove the stored key and switch into the next room. Otherwise print a message that the room is locked.

    • tryKillMonster

      private void tryKillMonster​(Room nextRoom)
      Kill the monster in the room if the player has a weapon in the backpack. Remove the weapon from the backpack and display a message in a popup that a monster was killed. Otherwise receive damage and flee back to the previous room.

    • rescuePrincess

      private void rescuePrincess()
      Rescue the princess and win the game if the player has the valuable 'dragonglass' in his/her backpack. Otherwise receive double damage to the players lifeBar and flee back to the previous room.

    • eatFromRoom

      public void eatFromRoom​(java.lang.String foodstring)
      Eat a food item lying in the current room. Eating something the player's FoodBar increases and the item is removed from the room. Called when clicking on the 'eat' button in the room. If the food is a magic muffin than the player gets the power to carry a unlimited weight in his/her backpack.
      Parameters:
      foodstring - the food that is eaten.

    • eatFromBackpack

      public void eatFromBackpack​(java.lang.String foodstring)
      Eat a food which is stored in the backpack. Eating something the player's FoodBar increases and the item is removed from the backpack. Called when clicking on the 'eat' button of backpack after typing in the name of the food in the text-field.
      Parameters:
      foodstring - the food that should be eaten

    • hint

      private java.lang.String hint()
      Return the NPC hint if there is one and the player has the suitable valuable in the backpack. Otherwise return a message that says the player should find the right valuable for him/her.
      Returns:
      hint or message

    • store

      private void store​(java.lang.String itemToStore)
      Put a portable item lying in the current room into the inventory. The item can be fetched later when needed. To use the function the player has to type in the name of the specified item which should be stored and click on the button 'store'. The item can't be stored when its weight would exceed the maximum portable weight of backpack
      Parameters:
      itemToStore - the string name of the item that should be stored (received from the textField)

    • drop

      public void drop​(java.lang.String typedWord)
      Drop an item from the backpack into the current room. To use the function the player has to type in the name of the specified item which should be dropped and click on the button 'drop'. An item can't be dropped when there is already an item of the same category in the room. (There can only be one food one weapon and one valuable item in a room at maximum.)
      Parameters:
      typedWord - the string name of the item that should be dropped (received from the textField)

    • destroy

      public void destroy​(java.lang.String typedWord)
      Destroy an item from the backpack. To use the function the player has to type in the name of the specified item which should be destroyed and click on the button 'destroy'.
      Parameters:
      typedWord - the name of the item that should be destroyed (received from the textField)

    • timeOver

      private boolean timeOver​(int time)
      Defines that the game is over if the variable 'time' is less than one.
      Parameters:
      time - ; the current left time
      Returns:
      'true' if the time if < 1; 'false' if not

    • getRandomRoom

      private Room getRandomRoom()
      Chooses an arbitrary room of the game except the teleporter-room.
      Returns:
      randomroom, a random room of the game. It can be every room of the game except the teleporter-room itself.

    • getLevel

      public static Level getLevel()
      Getter for the level of difficulty.
      Returns:
      the level of difficulty set by the user at the beginning of the game

    • setRoomOnMapVisible

      public void setRoomOnMapVisible()
      Display the GridPane for basement, ground or second floor depending on the room the player is in. Add that room to the small map on the screen.
